# Appendix

## Retrofit analysis

```{r}
#| echo: true
library(tidyverse)

retrofit_m01 <- read_delim("data/sanierungen_typ_M01.csv", delim = ",", show_col_types = FALSE)

cleaning_retrofit <- function(df){
  df %>%
    rename_all(~ gsub(" ", "_", .))
}


retrofit_m01_clean <- cleaning_retrofit(retrofit_m01)
```
